lessons.japanese: 君の悩みは僕の悩みと同じだ。
lessons.english: Your problem is similar to mine.

lessons.japanese: 金持ちにも貧乏人と同じく悩みがある。
lessons.english: The rich have troubles as well as the poor.

lessons.japanese: 何か悩みがあるのなら、彼に相談するといいですよ。
lessons.english: If you have some troubles, I recommend you confer with him.

lessons.japanese: なあ、トム、悩みごとなんか忘れちゃって。
lessons.english: Hey, Tom, forget about your worries.

lessons.japanese: どんな家にも内輪の悩みはあるものだ。
lessons.english: There is a skeleton in every closet.

lessons.japanese: それはぜいたくな悩みだよ。
lessons.english: Gee, I wish I had that problem.

lessons.japanese: ジャックの悩みの種は妻が彼の稼ぐ以上にお金を使うことだ。
lessons.english: Jack's problem is that his wife spends more than he earns.

lessons.japanese: これで私の悩みが増える。
私には悩みなど何もない。
lessons.english: I don't have a care in the world.

lessons.japanese: あなたは浮き世の悩みがないような顔をしている。
lessons.english: You look as if you don't have a care in the world.

lessons.japanese: あなたと私の悩みは似通っている。
lessons.english: Your problem and mine are similar.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は彼に悩みを打ち明けた。
lessons.english: She told her troubles to him.
